title: Kokurikozaka Kara
alternative_title: Coquelicot-zaka kara, From Up on Poppy Hill, コクリコ坂から
description: he story is set in Showa 38 (1963, a year before the Tokyo Olympics) and follows the coming of age of a high school girl named Matsuzaki Umi. The manga recounts her everyday life of laughter and tears with a school newspaper member, the student council president, and other schoolmates.
